name: TheGreatNovelsDrill
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the great novels drill
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill helps you learn about some of the greatest novels ever written in Western literature. The skill does this via drills and quizzes. During a drill, you just listen and absorb. During a quiz, it asks you questions and you answer them as best you can. At any time, you can say, “Quiz” or “Drill.”

For other drill skills, please go to: http://www.voicedrills.com

This skill was designed and developed by Witlingo. If you have feedback, please send an email to contact@witlingo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
